data.text:
Randolph County (link to FamilySearch page)

Established in 1779 from Guilford County. Many court records are missing; reason unknown.

(To do a quick search, use your browser’s search function. Press. Ctrl + F (Windows) or ⌘ Command + F (Mac).)
